task_description: Comprehensive portfolio website overhaul for sankalpbhandari.github.io. The site is currently a single-page HTML/CSS/JS portfolio using Bootstrap 4 and jQuery. This overhaul will: (1) Remove personal event pages (wedding/marriage/reception/NamingCeremony), (2) Modernize design with dark mode, better typography, and animations, (3) Add new sections (projects showcase, blog, testimonials, contact form), (4) Improve SEO and performance, (5) Integrate GitHub activity display, and (6) Clean up code and documentation. Decision: Staying with HTML/CSS/JS stack (upgrading to Bootstrap 5 with CSS variables for theming) rather than migrating to a framework, as this keeps the site simple, fast, and maintainable for a personal portfolio.

features.description: Remove all personal event pages (wedding, marriage, reception, NamingCeremony) including directories and related JSON files (event.json, names.json). This will free up ~73MB of space and remove unrelated content from the portfolio.
steps: Delete /wedding/ directory and all contents
Delete /marriage/ directory and all contents
Delete /reception/ directory and all contents
Delete /NamingCeremony/ directory and all contents
Delete event.json and names.json files
Search index.html for any links to these pages and remove them
Verify no broken references remain

features.description: Upgrade dependencies and restructure CSS architecture. Migrate from Bootstrap 4 + jQuery to Bootstrap 5 (no jQuery dependency). Consolidate and reorganize CSS files with CSS custom properties (variables) for theming support.
steps: Update Bootstrap CDN from 4.1.3 to 5.3.x in index.html
Remove jQuery dependency (not needed with Bootstrap 5)
Update Font Awesome to latest version 6.x
Create new CSS structure with variables for colors, spacing, typography
Refactor style.css to remove minified Bootswatch code and use clean custom CSS
Merge index.css and style.css into a single organized stylesheet (styles.css)
Update HTML classes to Bootstrap 5 equivalents where needed
Test that all existing functionality works with new dependencies

features.description: Implement dark mode with theme toggle and modernize typography/visual hierarchy. Define light and dark color palettes using CSS variables, add a theme toggle button, and update fonts for better readability.
steps: Define CSS custom properties for light theme (--color-bg, --color-text, --color-primary, --color-secondary, etc.)
Define CSS custom properties for dark theme with [data-theme='dark'] selector
Add theme toggle button in header/navigation area
Implement JavaScript for theme switching with localStorage persistence
Add prefers-color-scheme media query for OS-level dark mode detection
Update typography: choose modern font pairing (e.g., Inter for body, Poppins for headings)
Improve spacing and visual hierarchy throughout the page
Ensure all components adapt properly to both themes

Make footer responsive with stacked layout on mobile
Add appropriate padding and margins for mobile viewports
Test on various screen sizes (320px, 375px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px)
Ensure touch targets are appropriately sized (min 44px)
